name: Amoeboid
summary: Lead Phoebe the Amoeba through a microscopic world full of food, friends, and foes. Eat food particles, collect strands of DNA, and meet other microbial pals all while avoiding infection from the nasty viruses. If you get infected 3 times it's game over! Restore your health by finding "Happy Pills" then go "Radioactive" as the viruses attack in waves! How many levels will you make it through?
